long_description: Our large REI Classic duffel bag offers 4,600 cu. in. of space and comes in a convenient storage pouch for simple storage and transport when not in use. Urethane-coated 1,000-denier nylon is highly water resistant and very tough; dual zippers facilitate easy access into main compartment. Wrap-around 2 in. nylon webbing handles support the load. Tote duffel bag comfortably with the adjustable shoulder strap, included. Convenient storage sack doubles as a toiletry bag.
short_description: Our large REI Classic duffel bag offers 4,600 cu. in. of space and comes in a convenient storage pouch for simple storage and transport when not in use.
